```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidytext)
```

```{r}
files <- dir('../data/tweets/')[grep('RDS',dir('../data/tweets/'))]
tweets <- lapply(files, function(x) readRDS(paste0('../data/tweets/', x))) %>% bind_rows()
```

```{r}
custom_stop_words <- bind_rows(stop_words,
                               data_frame(word = tm::stopwords("spanish"),
                                          lexicon = "custom"),
                               data_frame(word = c("https", 
                                                   "rt",
                                                   "te",
                                                   "que",
                                                   "si"),
                                          lexicon = "manual"))
```

```{r}
top_x_ngram <- function(x=20, n=2) {
  tweets %>% 
    select(id, text, motivo) %>% 
    unnest_tokens(word,text) %>% 
    anti_join(custom_stop_words) %>% 
    filter(!grepl('\\.', word)) %>% 
    group_by(id, motivo) %>% 
    summarise(text = stringr::str_c(word, collapse = ' ')) %>% 
    unnest_tokens(ngram, 
                  text,
                  token='ngrams',
                  n=2) %>% 
    group_by(ngram, motivo) %>% 
    tally() %>% 
    group_by(motivo) %>% 
    top_n(20) %>% 
    arrange(motivo,desc(n))
}
```

```{r bi-gram}
top_x_ngram(20, 2)
```

```{r tri-gram}
top_x_ngram(20, 3)
```
